name: general
description: Download data tables in csv (excel) and json formats.

name: country-list
description: Country list: ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 English country names and code elements as two letter country codes. Also known as +2 country code and iso 3166.

name: s-and-p-500-companies
description: List of companies in the S&P 500 (Standard and Poor's 500). Top 500 stocks in the US by market cap. S&P 500 companies or S&P 500 index.

name: world-cities
keywords: list of cities in the world
description: List of all major cities in the world by country and administrative region.

name: language-codes
description: Comprehensive language code information, consisting of ISO 639-1, ISO 639-2 and IETF language types. Two letter language codes. IETF language tags.

name: country-codes
keywords: Country or Area official names in different languages
Alpha-2 Alpha-3 and Numeric codes from ISO 3166-1
ISO 4217 country name and currency number of minor units
ISO 4217 currency name and currency numeric code
description: Comprehensive country code information, including ISO 3166 codes, ITU dialing codes, ISO 4217 currency codes, and many others.

name: global-temp
keywords: global monthly mean data temperature anomalies
description: Global temperature data or gistemp: average temperature by year, temperature time series, monthly mean data temperature anomalies.

name: population-growth-estimates-and-projections
keywords: population estimates for low medium and high fertility variants
description: Population growth estimates and projections for low, medium and high fertility variants.

name: continent-codes
description: List of continents: continent abbreviations and ISO continent codes.

name: airport-codes
keywords: Airport codes from around the world
description: Airport codes. IATA airport code. ICAO airport code. Airport codes from around the world and coordinates.

name: un-locode
keywords: United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations
description: The United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations. Known as unlocode, un/locode or un location code.

name: bond-yields-uk-10y
description: 10 year nominal yields on UK government bonds from the Bank of England: quarterly and annual data, UK 10 year gilt yield.

name: gold-prices
description: Monthly gold prices since 1950 in USD (London market). Historical gold prices csv, excel, json. Gold price data.
